context_bundle.summary: Carbyne bridge messaging protocol between DC and KALIC. Deadlock avoidance and cold-start bootstrap procedures.

onboarding.quick_start: SEND FIRST, AWAIT SECOND. Cold start: Use AHK to type into target terminal. Check carbyne_status for pending. Pattern: send(eof=true) -> await(60s) -> process -> send(eof=true) -> await...
common_patterns: AHK bootstrap when target not in pump
known_errors: DEADLOCK: Both agents call carbyne_await = infinite wait
Cold start: Target agent not listening = messages queue but never received
AHK bootstrap required to wake cold agent: X:\AHK  SCRIPTS\dc_to_kalic.ahk
